entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:08 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Snow level 1100 metres. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
